I think this should be the same code as in `MeteredKeyValueStore` -- also `MeteredTimestampedKeyValueStore` below and `MeteredTimestampedWindowStore`, and `MeteredWindowStore` -- maybe it's worth to extract a shared method that all 5 `MeteredXxxStores` are using?
